parameters.name: tx_antenna_idx
parameters.comment: Index of Transmit Antenna (UMRR11 : 0 and 1 are ACC, 2 is AEB)

parameters.name: center_frequency_idx
parameters.comment: Index of center frequency (UMRR11: 0..3 in ACC selectable. In AEB mode values 2 and 3 are similar to 1.)

parameters.name: frequency_sweep_idx
parameters.comment: Index of sweep (UMRR11: currently always 0 because only one sweep for every TX-antenna. UMRR96: 0=226MHz, 1=512MHz, 2=1536MHz)

parameters.name: enable_tx_ant_toggle
parameters.comment: Automatic toggle of TX-Antenna 0->2->0 every radar cycle

parameters.name: angular_separation
parameters.comment: 0 = Disable Angular Separation, 1 = Enable Angular Separation
